Name: Commander Whiskertron
Description: Hailing from the pixelated planet of Meowtron, Commander Whiskertron is known for his strategic prowess and unbreakable discipline. Donning a rosso corsa colored box chassis with the classic arms and legs, he stands out in any battalion. His screen displays the iconic face of a cat, a tribute to his planet's feline supremacy. Equipped with the soldier's buttons and a sturdy helmet, Whiskertron leads his troop with courage and wit. As a member of the elite WebtrES club, he is both feared and respected across the digital realms. His tales of valor circulate through the data streams, inspiring both awe and ambition in aspiring program cadets.
